attributes.action: Make the owners of M&Ms to use halal and/or vegetarian ingredients.
attributes.background: M&Ms were falsy advertised as suitable for vegetarians and recently they disclosed that the chocolate snacks were mistakenly identified as being suitable for vegetarians. I believe that the owning company of M&Ms should use ingredients which are suitable for vegetarians as were previously intended.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be the responsibility of the manufacturer.
